Yahweh said to him,\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />\"Count how many Israelite men, from each family in Israel, and count them by name. \n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />You and Aaron must count the men who are at least twenty years old, those who can serve as soldiers in the army. Write down the number of the men, along with the names of their clans and families.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "01-04", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />I have chosen one man from each of the tribes to help you to do this. They listed the names of all the men who were at least 20 years old, and with their names they wrote the names of their clans and their family groups\n\n  <verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />just as Moses had commanded. They wrote the names while the Israelites were there in the wilderness of Sinai.</para>\n\n<para style=\"b\" />\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "01-20", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"li1\">\n\n<verse number=\"20-21\" style=\"v\" />There were 46,500 men from the tribe of Reuben (who was Jacob's oldest son) who were at  least twenty years old and were able to fight in battles. They must also take care of the other things that are inside the tent. When you travel, they are the ones who must carry the sacred tent and all the things that are inside it, and they must take care of it and set up their tents around it.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "01-51", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"51\" style=\"v\" />Whenever it is time for all of you to move to another location, the descendants of Levi are the ones who must dismantle the sacred tent. And when it is time to stop traveling, they are the ones who must set it up again. Any other person who goes near the sacred tent to do this work must be executed.\n\n<verse number=\"52\" style=\"v\" />The people of each Israelite tribe must set up their tents in their own area, and they must set up a flag that represents their tribe.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "01-53", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"53\" style=\"v\" />But the male descendants of Levi must set up their tents around the sacred tent in order to protect the other Israelite people from being punished by Yahweh for coming close to the sacred tent. The descendants of Levi are the ones who must stand around the Sacred Tent to guard it.\"\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"54\" style=\"v\" />So the Israelite people did everything just like Yahweh had commanded Moses.</para>\n"}], "number": "01", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "02-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said this to Aaron and Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />\"When the Israelites set up their tents, they are to set them up in areas that surround the sacred tent, but not close to it. The people of each tribe must set up their tents in a different area. Each tribe must erect in that area a flag that represents their tribe.</para>\n\n<para style=\"b\" />\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-03", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"li1\">\n\n<verse number=\"3-4\" style=\"v\" />The people of the tribe of Judah must set up their tents on the east side of the sacred tent, close to their tribal flag. They were Nadab the oldest, Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-03", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />These are the names of Aaron's sons who were anointed priests and set apart as priests and whom he ordained to serve as priests. \n\n<verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />But, while Yahweh was watching, Nadab and Abihu died in the wilderness of Sinai because they burned incense in a manner that was disobedient to what Yahweh had commanded. They had no sons, so Eleazar and Ithamar were the only sons of Aaron who were left to be priests, along with their father Aaron.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-05", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />\"Bring the men of the tribe of Levi and present them to Aaron, in order that they may assist him.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-07", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />They will serve Aaron and all the other Israelite people, while they do their work inside the sacred tent and outside it.\n\n<verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />They must serve all the Israelite people by taking care of all the things that are inside the sacred tent.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-09", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />Appoint them to help Aaron and his two sons. I have chosen them from all the Israelite people to do that.\n\n<verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />Appoint Aaron and his two sons to do the work that priests do. But anyone else who comes close to the sacred tent to do that work must be executed.\"\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-11", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also told Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />\"Note that from all the Israelites I have chosen the men of the tribe of Levi to take the places of all the firstborn sons of the Israelite people. The male descendants of Levi belong to me,\n\n  <verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />because truly all the firstborn males belong to me. That is because on the day that I killed all the firstborn sons of the people of Egypt, I spared all the firstborn sons of the Israelites and set them apart for myself. I also set apart the firstborn males of your domestic animals. They belong to me, Yahweh.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-14", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh spoke to Moses again in the wilderness of Sinai. He said,\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />\"Count the male members of the tribe of Levi. Write down their names and the names of their clans and family groups. Count all the males who are at least one month old.\"\n\n  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />So Moses counted them, just as Yahweh commanded.</para>\n\n<para style=\"li1\"></para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-17", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />Levi had three sons, whose names were Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.\n\n<para style=\"li1\">\n\n<verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />Gershon had two sons, Libni and Shimei. The clans who were descended from them had the same names as those two sons.</para>\n\n<para style=\"li1\">\n\n<verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />Kohath had four sons, Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel. The clans who were descended from them had the same names as those four sons.</para>\n\n<para style=\"li1\">\n\n<verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />Merari had two sons, Mahli and Mushi. The clans who were descended from them had the same names as those two sons.</para>\n\n<para style=\"li1\">Those are the clans who were descended from Levi.</para>\n\n<para style=\"b\" />\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-21", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />The two clans descended from Gershon are those that were descended from his sons Libni and Shimei.\n\n  <verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />In those two clans there were 7,500 males who were at least one month old.\n\n  <verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />They were told to set up their tents on the west side of the sacred tent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-24", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"24\" style=\"v\" />The leader of those two clans was Eliasaph son of Lael.\n\n<verse number=\"25\" style=\"v\" />Their work was to take care of the sacred tent, including its curtains and coverings and the curtain at its entrance,\n\n<verse number=\"26\" style=\"v\" />the curtains that formed the walls around the courtyard that is around the tent and around the altar, the curtains that were at the entrance of the courtyard, and the ropes for fastening the tent. They also did all the work of taking care of the things outside the sacred tent.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-27", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"27\" style=\"v\" />The clans that were descended from Kohath were those descended from his sons Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.\n\n  <verse number=\"28\" style=\"v\" />In those four clans there were 8,600 males who were at least one month old. The work of the men of the clans was to take care of the things that are inside the sacred tent.\n\n  <verse number=\"29\" style=\"v\" />They set up their tents on the south side of the sacred tent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-30", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"30\" style=\"v\" />The leader of those four clans was Elizaphan son of Uzziel.\n\n<verse number=\"31\" style=\"v\" />The work of the men of those clans was to take care of the sacred chest, the table on which the priest put the sacred bread, the lampstand, the altars, all the items that the priest used in the sacred tent, and the curtain that is inside the tent. Their work was also to take care of the things inside the tent.\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"32\" style=\"v\" />Aaron's son Eleazar was the leader of all the male descendants of Levi. He supervised all the work that was done at the sacred tent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-33", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"33\" style=\"v\" />The clans that were descended from Merari were those descended from his sons Mahli and Mushi.\n\n  <verse number=\"34\" style=\"v\" />In those two clans there were 6,200 males who were at least one month old.\n\n  <verse number=\"35\" style=\"v\" />They were told to set up their tents on the north side of the sacred tent. The leader of those two clans was Zuriel son of Abihail.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-36", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"36\" style=\"v\" />The work of the men of those two clans was to take care of the frames that held up the tent, the crossbars, the pillars, and the bases. They also did all the work that was connected with those items.\n\n<verse number=\"37\" style=\"v\" />Their work was also to take care of the posts that held up the curtains that formed the walls of the courtyard, and all the bases, tent pegs, and ropes that fastened those curtains.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-38", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"38\" style=\"v\" />Aaron and Moses and Aaron's sons were told to set up their tents in the area in front of the sacred tent, on the east side. Their work was to supervise the work that would be done in and around the sacred tent, for the benefit of the Israelite people. Only the priests were permitted to do that. Yahweh declared that anyone else who went near the tent to do the work that the priests do must be executed.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"39\" style=\"v\" />When Aaron and Moses counted all the males who were at least one month old, who belonged to the clans descended from Levi, the total was 22,000.</para>\n\n<para style=\"b\" />\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-40", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"40\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said to Moses, \"Now count all the other firstborn males in Israel who are at least one month old, and write down their names.\n\n  <verse number=\"41\" style=\"v\" />Also, set apart for me the descendants of Levi to be substitutes for the firstborn males of the other Israelites. And set apart for me the livestock of the descendants of Levi to be substitutes for the firstborn livestock of the other Israelite people.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-42", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"42\" style=\"v\" />So Moses did that. He counted the firstborn males of all the Israelite people, as Yahweh had commanded.\n\n  <verse number=\"43\" style=\"v\" />The total of those who were at least one month old was 22,273.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-44", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"44\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"45\" style=\"v\" />\"Set apart the descendants of Levi to be substitutes for the firstborn males of the other Israelite people. The descendants of Levi belong to me, Yahweh.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-46", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"46\" style=\"v\" />There are 273 more firstborn males of the other Israelite people than of the descendants of Levi.\n\n<verse number=\"47-48\" style=\"v\" />To pay for these 273 males, collect five pieces of silver for each of them. Each of those pieces of silver must weigh the same as each of the silver coins that are stored in the sacred tent. Give this silver to Aaron and his sons.\"\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-49", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"49\" style=\"v\" />So Moses did that. He collected the silver from those 273 males.\n\n  <verse number=\"50\" style=\"v\" />The total was 1,365 pieces of silver. Each silver coin weighed the same as each of the silver coins stored in the sacred tent.\n\n  <verse number=\"51\" style=\"v\" />Moses gave these silver coins to Aaron and his sons, as Yahweh had commanded.</para>\n"}], "number": "03", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "04-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />\"Write down the names of the men who belong to the clans descended from Kohath.\n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />Write the names of the men who are between 30 and 50 years old. These will be men who will do work at the sacred tent.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />The work of these descendants of Kohath will be to take care of the sacred items that are used when the people worship at the sacred tent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-05", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />When you Israelites move to another location, Aaron and his sons must enter the tent to take down the curtain that separates the very holy place from the holy place in the sacred tent. They must cover the sacred chest with that curtain.\n\n<verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />Then they must cover that with a covering made from sea cow skins. Over that they must spread a blue cloth. Then they must insert into the rings on the chest the poles for carrying it.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-07", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />Then they must put a blue cloth over the table on which the priests will put the bread to display before God. On top of the cloth they must put the bowls for incense, the pans, the other dishes, the jars for the wine that will be offered as a sacrifice, and the sacred bread.\n\n  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />Over all of this they must spread a scarlet cloth. Finally, they must put on top a covering made from sea cow skins. Then they must insert into the rings at the corners of the tables the poles for carrying it.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-09", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />Then with another blue cloth they must cover the lampstand, the lamps, the lamp snuffers, the trays, and the special jars of olive oil to burn in the lamps.\n\n  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />They must cover the lampstand and all the other items with a covering made from sea cow skins. They must place all these things on a frame for carrying them.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />Then they must spread another blue cloth over the gold altar which is used for burning incense. Over this they must spread a covering made from  sea cow skins. Then they must insert into the rings of that altar the poles for carrying it.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-12", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />They must take all the other items that are inside the sacred tent and wrap them in a blue cloth, cover that with a nice covering made from sea cow skins, and place all that on a frame for carrying it.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />Then they must remove the ashes from the altar on which they have burned sacrifices. Then they must cover the altar with a purple cloth.\n\n  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />Then they must spread on top of the cloth all the items used at the altar\u2014the pans for carrying the hot coals, the meat forks, the shovels, the bowls that hold the blood to sprinkle on the people, and all the other containers. Then they must spread over all those things a covering made from sea cow skins. Then they must insert into the rings at the sides of the altar the poles for carrying it.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-15", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />When Aaron and his sons have finished covering all these sacred things, the Israelite people will be ready to move to a new location. The descendants of Kohath must come and carry all the sacred things to the next place where the Israelites will set up their tents. But the descendants of Kohath must not touch any of these sacred items, because they will immediately die if they touch them. They are the ones who will carry these things, but they must not touch them.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />Aaron's son Eleazar will have the work of taking care of the olive oil for the lamps, the sweet smelling incense, the flour that will be burned on the altar each day, and the olive oil for anointing the priests. Eleazar is the one who will supervise the work that is done at the sacred tent and the men who take care of everything that is in it.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-17", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said to Aaron and Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"18-20\" style=\"v\" />\"When the descendants of Kohath approach the sacred items in the sacred tent to take them to another location, Aaron and his sons must always go in with them and show each of them what work to do and what things to carry. But the descendants of Kohath must not enter the sacred tent at any other time and look at the things that are in it. If they do that, I will get rid of all the descendants of Kohath.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-21", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />\"Write down the names of all the men who belong to the clans descended from Gershon.\n\n  <verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />Write the names of the men who are between thirty and fifty years old. They will be men who will also do work at the sacred tent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-24", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"24\" style=\"v\" />This is the work that they must do and the things that they must carry when you move to a new location:\n\n  <verse number=\"25\" style=\"v\" />They must carry the curtains of the Sacred Tent. They must carry the sacred tent and all the things that cover it, including the nice outer covering made from sea cow skins, and the curtain which is at the entrance of the sacred tent.\n\n  <verse number=\"26\" style=\"v\" />They must also carry the curtains that form the wall that surrounds the courtyard that surrounds the sacred tent and the altar, the curtain that is at the entrance to the courtyard, and the ropes that fasten the curtains. They must also do the packing and loading of these things.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-27", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"27\" style=\"v\" />Aaron and his sons will supervise the work of all the descendants of Gershom. That work includes carrying those things and doing other work that is necessary for moving them. They must tell each of the descendants of Gershom what things they must carry.\n\n<verse number=\"28\" style=\"v\" />Those are the tasks that you must give to the men who belong to the clans descended from Gershom. Aaron's son Ithamar is the one who will supervise their work.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-29", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"29\" style=\"v\" />Count also the men who belong to the clans descended from Merari.\n\n  <verse number=\"30\" style=\"v\" />Write the names of the men who are between thirty and fifty years old. They will be men who will also work at the sacred tent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-31", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"31\" style=\"v\" />Their work will be to carry the frames that hold up the sacred tent, the crossbars, the posts that hold up the curtains, and the bases.\n\n<verse number=\"32\" style=\"v\" />They must also carry the posts for the curtains that form the walls of the courtyard and the bases for the posts, the tent pegs, and the ropes to fasten the curtains. Tell each man what things he must carry.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-33", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"33\" style=\"v\" />Those are the tasks that the descendants of Merari must do at the sacred tent. Aaron's son Ithamar is the one who will supervise them.\"\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-34", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"34\" style=\"v\" />So Aaron and Moses and the Israelite leaders counted the descendants of Kohath, writing also the names of their clans and family groups.\n\n  <verse number=\"35\" style=\"v\" />They counted all the men who were between thirty and fifty years old who were able to work at the sacred tent.\n\n  <verse number=\"36\" style=\"v\" />The total was 2,750 men.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-37", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"37\" style=\"v\" />They were the descendants of Kohath who were able to work at the sacred tent. Aaron and Moses counted them just as Yahweh had commanded Moses.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-38", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"38\" style=\"v\" />They also counted the descendants of Gershon, writing also the names of their clans and family groups.\n\n  <verse number=\"39\" style=\"v\" />They counted all the men who were between thirty and fifty years old who were able to work at the sacred tent.\n\n  <verse number=\"40\" style=\"v\" />The total was 2,630 men.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-41", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"41\" style=\"v\" />They were the descendants of Gershon who were able to work at the sacred tent. Aaron and Moses counted them as Yahweh had commanded.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-42", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"42\" style=\"v\" />They also counted the descendants of Merari, writing also the names of their clans and family groups.\n\n  <verse number=\"43\" style=\"v\" />They counted all the men who were between thirty and fifty years old who were able to work at the sacred tent.\n\n  <verse number=\"44\" style=\"v\" />The total was 3,200 men.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-45", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"45\" style=\"v\" />They were the descendants of Merari who were able to work. Aaron and Moses counted them as Yahweh had commanded Moses.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-46", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"46\" style=\"v\" />So Aaron and Moses and the Israelite leaders counted all the descendants of Levi, writing also the names of their clans and family groups.\n\n  <verse number=\"47\" style=\"v\" />They counted all the men who were between thirty and fifty years old. They were ones who were able to work at the sacred tent and who carried the tent and everything that was connected with it.\n\n  <verse number=\"48\" style=\"v\" />The total was 8,580 men.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-49", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"49\" style=\"v\" />They completed the counting of all the descendants of Levi, as Yahweh had commanded Moses. And they told each man what work he was to do and what things he must carry when they moved to a new location.\n"}], "number": "04", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "05-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />\"Tell this to the Israelite people: 'You must send away from your camp where you have your tents any man or woman who has leprosy and anyone who has a discharge of some fluid from his body, and anyone who has become unacceptable to God because of having touched a corpse.\n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />Send them away in order that they will not touch people in the camp area where I live among you and cause them to become unacceptable to me.'\"\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />So the Israelite people obeyed what Yahweh commanded Moses.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-05", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also told Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />\"Tell this to the Israelite people: 'If someone commits a crime against another person, I consider that that person has done wrong to me.\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />That person must confess that he or she is guilty, and he or she must pay to the person to whom wrong was done what others consider to be a suitable payment for what he has done, and he must pay an extra 20 percent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-08", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />If the person against whom the wrong was done has died and there is no relative to whom the money can be paid, then the money belongs to me, and it must be paid to the priest. In addition, the one who did the wrong must give a male sheep to the priest to sacrifice in order that that person's sin may be forgiven.\n\n<verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />All the sacred offerings that the Israelites present to me and bring to the priest belong to the priest.\n\n<verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />The priest can keep those gifts.'\"\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-11", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also said this to Moses:\n\n  <verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />\"Tell this to the Israelite people: 'Suppose a man thinks that his wife has not always slept faithfully only with him.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-13", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />Suppose he thinks that she has had sex with another man, but neither he nor anyone else knows if it is true or not, because no one saw her doing that.\n\n<verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />But if the woman's husband is jealous, and if he suspects that she has committed adultery, and he wants to know whether that is true or not,\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-15", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />he should take his wife to the priest. He must take along as an offering two liters of barley flour. The priest must not pour olive oil or incense on it, because this is an offering that the man has brought because he is jealous. It is an offering to find out if she is guilty or not.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-16", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />The priest must tell the woman to stand in front of the altar in my presence.\n\n  <verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />He must put some sacred water in a clay jar, and then he must put some dirt from the floor of the sacred tent into the water.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-18", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />He must untie the woman's hair. Then he must put in her hands the flour offering that her jealous husband is offering to determine whether she has committed adultery or not. The priest must hold the bowl that contains bitter water that will cause the woman to be cursed if she is guilty.\n\n<verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />The priest must require her to solemnly declare that she will tell the truth. He must say to her, \"Has another man had sex with you? Have you faithfully slept only with your husband or not? If you have not slept with another man, nothing bad will happen to you if you drink the water.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-20", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />But if you have had sex with another man, Yahweh will curse you.\n\n<verse number=\"21-22\" style=\"v\" />Your womb will shrivel up and your stomach will swell up. You will never be able to give birth to children, and as a result, everyone will curse you and avoid you. If you have committed adultery, when you drink this water, that is what will happen to you.\" Then the woman must answer, \"If I am guilty, I will not object if that happens.\"\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-23", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />Then the priest must write with ink on a small scroll these curses and then wash the ink off into the bitter water.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-24", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"24-25\" style=\"v\" />The priest must take from her the offering of barley flour that she is holding; he must lift it up to dedicate it to me. Then he must put it on the altar\n\n<verse number=\"26\" style=\"v\" />and burn part of it as a sacrifice. Then the woman must drink the bitter water.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-27", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"27\" style=\"v\" />If the woman has committed adultery instead of faithfully sleeping only with her husband, the water will cause her to suffer greatly. Her stomach will swell up and her womb will shrink, and she will be unable to give birth to children. And then her relatives will curse her.\n\n<verse number=\"28\" style=\"v\" />But if she is innocent, her body will not be harmed, and she will still be able to give birth to children.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-29", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"29\" style=\"v\" />That is the ritual that must be performed when a woman who is married has sinned by committing adultery,\n\n  <verse number=\"30\" style=\"v\" />or when a man is jealous and suspects that his wife has had sex with another man. The priest must tell that woman to stand at the altar in my presence and obey these instructions.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "05-31", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"31\" style=\"v\" />Even if the woman has not done what the husband suspected, he will not be punished for doing something wrong by bringing his wife to the priest. But if his wife is guilty, she will suffer as a result.'\"\n"}], "number": "05", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "06-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also said this to Moses:\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />\"Tell this to the Israelite people: If any of you wants to make a solemn promise to dedicate himself to belong to me in a special way, after you obey these instructions, you will be called a Nazir, which means 'a dedicated person.'\n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />You must not drink any wine or other alcoholic drink. You must not drink grape juice or eat grapes or raisins.\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />You must not eat anything that comes from grapevines, not even the skins or seeds of grapes, during the time that you are a Nazir.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-05", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />Even your hair will be dedicated to me during the time that you are a Nazir, so you must never allow anyone to cut your hair. Until the time that your solemn promise to dedicate yourself to me is ended, you must allow your hair to grow long.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-06", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />And you must not go near a corpse during the time that you are a Nazir.\n\n<verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />Even if the person who died is your father or your mother or your brother or your sister, you must not cause yourself to become unacceptable to me by coming close to the corpse. Your long hair shows that you belong to me in a special way, so you must do what you have solemnly promised and not cut your hair.\n\n<verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />You are required to keep doing this all the time that you are dedicated to me in this special way.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-09", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />If anyone dies very suddenly when he is near you, then your hair that you have dedicated to me is no longer sacred. So you must wait seven days and then shave it all off. Then you must perform a special ritual to cause yourself to become acceptable to me again.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-10", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />The next day you must bring two doves or two young pigeons to the priest at the entrance of the sacred tent.\n\n<verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />The priest must kill the birds and offer them as sacrifices. One of them will be an offering to take away the guilt of your sin, and the other will be an offering that is burned completely to please me. After the priests burns them on the altar, I will forgive you for having come close to a corpse, and when your hair grows again it will be dedicated to me again.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-12", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />The amount of time that you were set apart for me the previous time does not count, because you had become unacceptable to me by coming close to a corpse during the time that you were a Nazir. So you must again make a solemn promise to dedicate yourself to me for the entire amount of time that you indicated the previous time. And you must also sacrifice a one year old lamb to take away your guilt.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-13", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />When the time that you promised to dedicate yourself to me is ended, go to the entrance of the sacred tent\n\n  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />and offer as sacrifices to me three animals that have no defects.  Offer a one year old ram that will be burned completely, a one year old female lamb as a sacrifice to take away the guilt of your sin, and one full-grown ram as a sacrifice to restore fellowship with me.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />When you bring those animals, you must also bring some wine to offer as a sacrifice. And you must also bring a basket of bread that you have made with very good flour and olive oil. But you must not put any yeast in the bread. Also brush some olive oil on some thin wafers and bring them to the priest.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-16", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />The priest will put the young lamb and the young ram on the altar and completely burn them, in order that I will be pleased and will forgive you.\n\n  <verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />Then he will kill the full-grown ram as an offering to restore fellowship with me, and he will also burn on the altar some of the bread and the flour and wine.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-18", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />After that, you must stand at the entrance of the sacred tent and shave off your hair. Then you must put that hair in the fire that is under the animal that has been sacrificed on the altar to restore fellowship with me.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-19", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />The meat from the ram's shoulder must be boiled. After it is cooked, the priest will take it along with one of the loaves of bread and one wafer which has been brushed with olive oil, and he will put them in your hands.\n\n  <verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />Then the priest will take them back and lift them up high to dedicate them to me. They now belong to the priest, and he is permitted to eat some of the meat from the ram's shoulder and from its ribs and from one of its thighs, because that meat is his share of the sacrifice. After that, you will no longer be a Nazir, and you will again be permitted to drink wine.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-21", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />Those are the regulations about the offerings that Nazir solemnly promise to bring to me to end their time of being dedicated to me. They must bring these offerings, but if they want to, they may bring additional offerings. And they must do everything that they solemnly promised to do when they dedicated themselves to me.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-22", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />\"Tell Aaron and his sons that when they ask me to bless the people, they must say,</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\n\n<verse number=\"24\" style=\"v\" />'I desire that Yahweh will bless you</para>\n\n<para style=\"q2\">and protect you,</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\"></para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "06-25", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"25\" style=\"v\" />and that he will smile on you\n\n<para style=\"q2\">and act kindly toward you,</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\n\n<verse number=\"26\" style=\"v\" />and that he will be good to you</para>\n\n<para style=\"q2\">and cause things to go well for you.'\"</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"27\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said, \"If Aaron and his sons ask me to bless the Israelite people, truly I will bless them.\"</para>\n"}], "number": "06", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "07-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />When Moses had finished setting up the sacred tent, he poured oil on it, and set it apart for the honor of Yahweh. He also dedicated the things that are inside the sacred tent, and the altar for burning sacrifices, and all the things that would be used at the altar.\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />Then the leaders of the twelve Israelite tribes, the same men who had helped Aaron and Moses to count the men who could fight in battles,\n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />came to the sacred tent, bringing gifts to Yahweh. They brought six sturdy carts and twelve oxen, one ox from each of the leaders and a cart from each of the two leaders.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "07-04", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />\"Accept these gifts, in order that the descendants of Levi can use them for carrying the sacred items that are here at the sacred tent.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "07-06", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />So Moses took the carts and oxen and gave them to the descendants of Levi.\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />He gave two carts and four oxen to the descendants of Gershon for their work,\n\n  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />and he gave four carts and eight oxen to the descendants of Merari for their work. Aaron's son Ithamar was the supervisor of all their work.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "07-09", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />But he did not give any carts or oxen to the descendants of Kohath, because they took care of the sacred items that were to be carried on their shoulders, not on carts.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "07-10", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />On the day that the altar was dedicated, the twelve leaders brought other gifts to be dedicated and put them in front of the altar.\n\n  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh said to Moses, \"Each of the next twelve days one leader should bring his gifts for the dedication of the altar.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "07-12", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"12-13\" style=\"v\" />On the first day, Nahshon son of Amminadab, from the tribe of Judah brought his gifts:\n\n<para style=\"li1\">a silver dish that weighed more than 1.5 kilograms and a silver bowl that weighed .8 kilograms, both of which were full of good flour and mixed with olive oil to be flour offerings. decorations at the top that resembled flowers. The lampstand was made exactly as Yahweh had told Moses that it should be made.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-05", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />\"You must cause the descendants of Levi to be acceptable to me by setting them apart from the other Israelite people.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-07", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />Do that by sprinkling them with water which will symbolize their being freed from the guilt of their sins. Then they must shave off all the hair of their bodies and wash their clothes.\n\n<verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />Then they must bring one bull and some flour mixed with olive oil. Those things will be burned as sacrifices. They must also bring another bull that will be sacrificed to take away the guilt of their sins.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-09", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />Then you must summon all the Israelite people to come together in front of the sacred tent, to gather around the descendants of Levi.\n\n<verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />Then the Israelite people must lay their hands on the descendants of Levi.\n\n<verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />Aaron must then present them to me to be a gift from the Israelite people, as if he had lifted them up to me, in order that they can work for me at the sacred tent.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-12", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />After that, the descendants of Levi must place their hands on the heads of the two bulls. Then the bulls will be killed and burned on the altar. One will be an offering to take away the guilt of their sins, and the other will be completely burned to please me.\n\n  <verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />The descendants of Levi must stand at the altar in front of Aaron and his sons, and you must then dedicate them to me, as if you had lifted them up to me.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-14", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />This ritual will show that the descendants of Levi are set apart from the other Israelites and that they belong to me.\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />After the descendants of Levi have been made acceptable to me, and presented to me like a special offering as if they had been lifted up to me, they may start to work at the sacred tent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-16", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />They will belong to me. They will work for me as substitutes for the firstborn males of all the Israelites, who also belong to me.\n\n<verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />All the firstborn males in Israel, both the people and the animals, are mine. When I caused all the firstborn sons of the people of Egypt to die, I set them apart for myself. But I spared the firstborn of all males of the Israelites, of people and animals, because they are mine. \n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-18", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />But now I have chosen the descendants of Levi to take the places of the firsborn male sons of the other Israelites.\n\n<verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />I have appointed the descendants of Levi to help Aaron and his sons at the sacred tent, as Aaron and his sons offer the sacrifices to take away the guilt of the Israelite people's sins, and to prevent the Israelites from coming close to the tent with the result that a plague would cause many of them to become sick and die.\"\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-20", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />Aaron and Moses and the other Israelites helped the descendants of Levi to do everything that Yahweh had commanded.\n\n  <verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />The descendants of Levi sprinkled themselves with water to symbolize that they had been freed from the guilt of their sins, and they washed their clothes. Then Aaron brought them to the altar to present them to Yahweh, just as if he had lifted them up to him, and he offered sacrifices to take away the guilt of their sins and cause them to become acceptable to Yahweh.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-22", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />After that, the descendants of Levi started to work at the sacred tent to assist Aaron and his sons. They did that just as Yahweh had commanded Moses.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-23", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also said this to Moses:\n\n  <verse number=\"24\" style=\"v\" />\"The descendants of Levi who are between twenty-five years and fifty years old will work at the sacred tent.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "08-25", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"25\" style=\"v\" />But after they become fifty years old, they must retire.\n\n<verse number=\"26\" style=\"v\" />They may help their fellow descendants of Levi do their work at the sacred tent, but they must not do the work themselves. That is what you must tell them about the work they will do.\"\n"}], "number": "08", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "09-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />One year after the Israelites left Egypt, during the month of March, while they were in the wilderness of Sinai, Yahweh said to Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />\"Tell the Israelite people that they must celebrate the Passover festival again.\n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />They must do it on the fourteenth day of this month, early in the evening, and they must obey all the instructions about it that I gave you previously.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-04", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />So Moses told the people what Yahweh had said about celebrating the Passover.\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />The people celebrated it there in the wilderness of Sinai, in the evening of the fourteenth day of the month, just as Yahweh had commanded Moses.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-06", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />But some of the Israelite people had touched a corpse, and as a result they had become unfit to celebrate the Passover. So they asked Aaron and Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />\"It is true that we have touched a corpse. But why should that prevent us from celebrating the Passover festival and offering sacrifices to Yahweh like everyone else?\"</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />Moses replied, \"Wait here until I go into the sacred tent and find out what Yahweh says about it.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-09", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />So Moses went into the tent and asked Yahweh what he should tell the people, and this is what Yahweh said:\n\n  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />\"Tell this to the Israelite people: 'If any of you or your descendants touch a corpse and as a result become unacceptable to me, or if you are away from home on a long trip at the time to celebrate the Passover, you will still be permitted to celebrate it.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-11", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />But you must celebrate it exactly one month later, early in the evening of the fourteenth day of that month. Eat the meat of the lamb for the Passover festival with bread that is baked without yeast, and eat bitter herbs.\n\n<verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />Do not leave any of it until the next morning. And do not break any of the lamb's bones. Obey all the regulations about celebrating the Passover.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-13", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />But if any of you has not done anything that would make you unfit to celebrate the Passover festival, and you are not away from home on a long trip, and you do not sacrifice to me at the proper time, you will no longer belong to my people. You will be punished.\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />Foreigners who live among you may also celebrate the Passover festival, if they obey all my commands concerning it.'\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-15", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"15-16\" style=\"v\" />On the day that the sacred tent was set up, a cloud covered it. But from the time that the sun set until the time that the sun rose the next day, the cloud resembled a huge fire. And that is what happened every day that the Israelites were in the wilderness.\n\n  <verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />When the cloud rose up and started to move to a new location, the Israelites followed it. When the cloud stopped, the Israelites stopped there and set up their tents.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-18", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />The Israelites moved when Yahweh told them when to move and when to stop by causing the cloud to move or stop. When the cloud stayed over the sacred tent, the Israelites stayed at that place.\n\n<verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />Sometimes the cloud stayed over the sacred tent for a long time, so when that happened, the Israelites did not move.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-20", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />Sometimes the cloud remained over the sacred tent for only a few days. The people stopped and set up their tents as Yahweh commanded them, and they moved to a new location when Yahweh commanded them to do that.\n\n<verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />Sometimes the cloud stayed in one place for only one day. When that happened, when the cloud rose up into the sky the next morning, then the people moved. Whenever the cloud moved, during the day or during the night, the people moved.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "09-22", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />If the cloud stayed over the sacred tent for two days, or for a month, or for a year, during that time the people stayed where they were. But when the cloud rose up into the sky, they started to move.\n\n<verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />When Yahweh commanded them to stop and set up their tents, they did that. When he told them to move, they moved. They did whatever Yahweh told Moses  they should do.\n"}], "number": "09", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "10-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh also told Moses,\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />\"Tell someone to make two trumpets by hammering each one from one lump of silver. Blow the trumpets to summon the people to come together and also to signal that they must move their tents to a new location.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-03", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />If both trumpets are blown, it means that everyone must gather together at the entrance of the sacred tent.\n\n<verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />If only one trumpet is blown, it means that only the twelve leaders of the tribes must gather together.\n\n<verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />If the trumpets are blown loudly, the tribes that are to the east of the sacred tent should start to move.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-06", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />When the trumpets are blown loudly the second time, the tribes that are to the south should start to move. The loud blasts on the trumpet will signal that they should start to move.\n\n<verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />When you want only to gather the people together, blow the trumpets, but do not blow them as loudly.\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />The priests who are descended from Aaron are the ones who should blow the trumpets. That is a regulation that will never be changed.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-09", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />When you fight against enemies who attack you in your own land, tell the priests to blow the trumpets loudly. I, Yahweh, your God, will hear that, and I will rescue you from your enemies.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-10", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />Also tell the priests to blow the trumpets when the people are happy, and at the festivals each year, and at the times when they celebrate the new moon each month. Tell them to blow the trumpets when the people bring offerings that will be completely burned, and when they bring offerings to restore fellowship with me. If they do that, it will help you to think about me. You must do that, because I am Yahweh your God.\"\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-11", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />In the second year after the Israelites left Egypt, on the twentieth day of the second month, the cloud rose up from above the sacred tent.\n\n  <verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />So the Israelites moved from the wilderness of Sinai, and they continued traveling north until the cloud stopped in the wilderness of Paran.\n\n  <verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />That was the first time they moved, obeying the instructions that Yahweh had given to Moses to tell them.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-14", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />The group that went first, carrying their flag, was the group from the tribe of Judah. Nahshon son of Amminadab, was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Issachar followed them. Nethanel son of Zuar, was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Zebulun went next. Eliab son of Helon, was their leader.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-17", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />Then they dismantled the sacred tent, and the descendants of Gershon and Merari carried it, and they went next.\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Reuben went next, carrying their flag. Elizur son of Shedeur was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Simeon was next. Shelumiel son of Zurishaddai was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Gad was next. Eliasaph son of Deuel was their leader.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-21", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />The group descended from Kohath was next. They carried the sacred items from the sacred tent. The sacred tent was set up at the new location before they arrived there.\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Ephraim was next, carrying their flag. Elishama son of Ammihud, was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Manasseh went next. Gamaliel son of Pedahzur, was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"24\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Benjamin was next. Abidan son of Gideoni, was their leader.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-25", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"25\" style=\"v\" />The ones who went last were the groups from the tribe of Dan, carrying their flag. Ahiezer son of Ammishaddai, was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"26\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Asher went next. Pagiel son of Ocran, was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"27\" style=\"v\" />The group from the tribe of Naphtali went last. Ahira son of Enan, was their leader.\n\n  <verse number=\"28\" style=\"v\" />That was the order in which the groups of Israelite tribes traveled.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-29", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"29\" style=\"v\" />One day Moses said to his brother-in-law Hobab son of Reuel from the Midian people group, \"We are on the way to the place that Yahweh promised to give to us. Come with us, and we will take good care of you, because Yahweh has promised to do good things for us Israelite people.\"</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"30\" style=\"v\" />But Hobab replied, \"No, I will not go with you. I want to return to my own land and to my own family.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-31", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"31\" style=\"v\" />But Moses said, \"Please do not leave us. You know the places where we can set up our tents in this desert, and you can guide us.\n\n  <verse number=\"32\" style=\"v\" />Come with us. We will share with you all the good things that Yahweh gives to us.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-33", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"33\" style=\"v\" />So Hobab agreed to go with them. The Israelites left Mount Sinai, which they called the Mountain of Yahweh, and they walked for three days. The men carrying the sacred chest went in front of the other people for those three days, and they kept looking for a place to set up their tents.\n\n  <verse number=\"34\" style=\"v\" />The cloud sent by Yahweh was over them every day.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "10-35", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"35\" style=\"v\" />Each morning when the men who were carrying the sacred chest started to walk, Moses said,</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\"Yahweh, arise!</para>\n\n<para style=\"q2\">Scatter your enemies!</para>\n\n<para style=\"q2\">Cause those who hate you to run away from you!\"</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"36\" style=\"v\" />And each time the men stopped to set down the sacred chest, Moses said,</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\"Yahweh, stay close to the multiplied thousands of us Israelites!\"</para>\n"}], "number": "10", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "11-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />One day the people complained to Yahweh about their troubles. When Yahweh heard what they were saying, he became angry. So he sent a fire which burned among the people at the edge of their camp.\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />Then the people cried out to Moses, and he prayed to Yahweh. Then the fire stopped burning.\n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />So they called that place Taberah, which means 'Burning,' because the fire from Yahweh had burned among them.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-04", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />Then some troublemakers from other people groups who were traveling with the Israelites began to want better food. And when they started complaining the Israelite people also started to complain.\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />They said, \"We wish we had some meat!\n\n  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />We remember the fish that we ate while we were in Egypt, fish that was given to us without cost. And we had all the cucumbers, melons, leeks, onions, and garlic that we wanted. But now we do not have any desire to eat, because all we have to eat is this manna!\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-07", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />The manna resembled small white seeds.\n\n  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />Each morning the people would go out and gather some from the surface of the ground. Then they made flour by grinding it or pounding it with stones. Then they added water and boiled it in a pot, or they made flat cakes with it and baked them. The cakes tasted like bread that was baked with olive oil.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-09", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />Each night the manna came down on the ground where their tents were, like dew from the sky.\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />Moses heard all the Israelite people complaining as they were standing in the entrances of their tents. Yahweh became very angry, and Moses was also very perturbed.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-11", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />He went into the sacred tent and asked Yahweh, \u201cWhy have you brought this trouble on me, your servant? Act mercifully to me! What wrong have I done, with the result that you have appointed me to take care of all of these people?\n\n<verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />I am not their father. Why have you told me to take care of them like a woman carries around her baby and nurses it? How can I take them to the land that you promised to give to our ancestors?\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-13", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />Where can I get meat to feed to all these people? They keep complaining to me, saying, 'Give us some meat to eat!'\n\n<verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />I cannot carry all these people's burdens by myself! They are like a heavy load to me, and I cannot carry this very heavy load anymore.\n\n<verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />If you intend to act like this toward me, kill me now. If you are really concerned about me, be kind to me and kill me to end my misery of trying to take care of them!\"\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-16", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh said to Moses, \"Summon seventy men whom you know are leaders among the Israelite people. Tell them to stand with you in front of the sacred tent.\n\n  <verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />I will come down and talk with you there. Then I will take some of the power of my Spirit that you have, and I will put that power on them also. They will help you to take care of some of the things that the people are concerned about, in order that you will not need to do it alone.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-18", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />Furthermore, say to the people, 'Make yourselves acceptable to me, and tomorrow you will have meat to eat. You were complaining, and Yahweh heard you when you were saying, \"We want some meat to eat. We had better food in Egypt!\" Now Yahweh will give you some meat, and you will eat it.\n\n  <verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />You will eat meat not only for one or two days, or only for five or ten or twenty days.\n\n  <verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />You will eat meat every day for one month, and then you will loathe it, and it will cause you to want to vomit. This will happen because you have rejected Yahweh who is here among you, and you have wailed in his presence, saying \u201cWe would have had better food to eat if we had not left Egypt.\" ' \"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-21", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />But Moses replied to Yahweh, \u201cThere are six hundred thousand men plus women and children here with me, so why do you say \u2018I will give them plenty of meat every day for a month!\u2019?\n\n  <verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />Even if we killed all the sheep and cattle, that would not be enough to provide meat for all of them! Even if we caught all the fish in the sea and gave it to them, that would not be enough!\"\n\n  <verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />But Yahweh said to Moses, \u201cDo you think that I have no power? You will now see if I can do what I say I will do.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-24", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"24\" style=\"v\" />So Moses went out from the sacred tent and told the people what Yahweh had said. Then he gathered together the seventy leaders and told them to stand around the sacred tent.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"25\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh came down in the cloud that was above the tent and spoke to Moses. He took some of the power of the Spirit that he had given to Moses and gave it to the seventy leaders. By means of the power of the Spirit within them, they prophesied, but they did that only once.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-26", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"26\" style=\"v\" />Two of the leaders whom Moses appointed, Eldad and Medad, were not there when the rest of them gathered together. They had not left their tents to go and stand around the sacred tent. But Yahweh's Spirit came on them also, and they started to prophesy.  \n\n  <verse number=\"27\" style=\"v\" />So a young man ran and told Moses, \"Eldad and Medad are prophesying where all their tents are!\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-28", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"28\" style=\"v\" />Joshua, who had helped Moses since he was a young man, said, \"Sir, tell them to stop doing that!\"</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"29\" style=\"v\" />But Moses replied, \u201cAre you worried that they might injure my reputation? I wish that all Yahweh's people could prophesy. I wish that Yahweh would give the power of his Spirit to all of them!\"\n\n  <verse number=\"30\" style=\"v\" />Then Moses and all the leaders went back to their tents.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-31", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"31\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh sent a strong wind from the sea. It blew quail into the area all around the camp, and caused the quail to fall onto the ground. They were piled up on the ground about a meter high!\n\n  <verse number=\"32\" style=\"v\" />So the people went out and gathered up the quail all that day, and all that night, and all of the following day. It seemed as though each person gathered nearly two cubic meters! They spread the quail out on the ground all around the camp, so that the quail would lose their moisture.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "11-33", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"33\" style=\"v\" />Then they cooked them and started to eat them. But while they were still eating the meat, Yahweh showed that he was very angry with them. He sent a severe plague on them, and many people died.\n\n<verse number=\"34\" style=\"v\" />The people who died and were buried were the ones who had said they wanted to eat meat like they had formerly eaten in Egypt. So they called that place Kibroth Hattaavah, which means 'graves of those who craved.'\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"35\" style=\"v\" />From there, the Israelites continued walking east until they arrived at Hazeroth, where they stopped and stayed for a long time.</para>\n"}], "number": "11", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "12-01", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1-2\" style=\"v\" />Moses' older sister Miriam and his older brother Aaron were saying this: \u201cIs Moses the only one to whom Yahweh has spoken messages to tell to us? Does Yahweh not speak messages to us two also?\u201d They told people that they were saying that because Moses had married a woman who was a descendant of the Cush people group, but they were really saying that because they were jealous. But Yahweh heard what they were saying.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />The truth was that Moses was very humble. He was more humble than anyone else on the earth and Moses had not appointed himself to be their leader.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "12-04", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />So immediately Yahweh spoke to Moses and to Aaron and Miriam. He said, \u201cAll three of you must go and stand at the sacred tent.\u201d So they did that.\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />Then Yahweh descended to the entrance of the tent in a cloud that resembled a huge white pillar. He told Aaron and Miriam to step forward, so they did.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "12-06", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />Then he said to them,\n\n<para style=\"q1\">and I speak to him in dreams.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\n\n<verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />But that is not the way I speak to my servant Moses.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q2\">I trust that he will lead my people well.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\n\n<verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />So I talk to him face to face.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q2\">I speak to him clearly, not using parables.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q2\">He has even seen what I look like.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q2\">So you should be afraid to criticize my servant Moses!\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "12-09", "img": "", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />Yahweh was very angry with Miriam and Aaron, and he left.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />When the cloud rose up from the sacred tent, Aaron looked at Miriam, and he saw that her skin was as white as snow, because she now had leprosy.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "12-11", "img": "", "text": "<verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />Aaron said to Moses, \"My master, please do not punish us for this sin that we have foolishly committed.\n\n<verse number=\"12\"
